long_description: hop into fun at hopup, india’s most epic entertainment center that amalgamates vr gaming, trampoline activities, kids’ play zone, and restaurant dining into an immersive, interactive, and new-age experience for family & friends under one roof. let the good times roll at amazing bowling alleys and the biggest go-karting track in chandigarh region. home to an array of arcade games and slides and roll glider among other activities, the wall climbing and rope course make hopup somewhat of an adventure park. located in zirakpur, near chandigarh it’s home to the biggest trampoline park in india and serves people of all ages as the best place to have fun and spend their day.
